content.text: Phantom
Stealth operator. Move unseen, strike from ambush, disappear. Abilities focus on positioning, information denial, and punishing vulnerable targets.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
Ambush Training (Passive): When you attack an enemy that hasn’t acted yet this encounter, your first attack gets +2 accuracy.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Fade (Active, 1 AP): After attacking, become hidden (Stealth check vs highest enemy Awareness in Close range). Hidden until you attack or are found.
Mark Target (Active, 1 AP): All allies get +1 accuracy against a target you designate until end of your next turn.
Shadow Step (Passive): Moving through occupied zones doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.
Patient Killer (Passive): If you don’t attack on your turn, your first attack next turn gets +3 accuracy. Waiting for the perfect moment.
Concealed Blade (Passive): Your first attack from hidden deals +1 damage per die (after armor). The ambush cuts deeper.
Escape Artist (Passive): Breaking free from Grapple, Prone, or restraints costs 0 AP instead of 1. You slip out of everything.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Exploit Opening (Passive): Attacks against Prone, Stunned, or Grappled enemies deal +2 damage per die (after armor). You punish vulnerability.
Vanishing Act (Active, 2 AP): You cannot be targeted until start of your next turn. Once per encounter.
Crippling Strike (Active, 1 AP): Your next melee attack applies Immobilize on hit (target cannot move for 1 turn).
Nerve Strike (Active, 1 AP): Your next melee attack applies -2 to the target’s next attack (you hit a nerve cluster, disrupt their coordination). Stacks with other debuffs.

Misdirection (Active, 1 AP): Create a false position. Until end of your next turn, the next attack targeting you automatically misses — they attacked where you were, not where you are. Once per encounter.

Shadow Network (Passive): While hidden, you can communicate silently with all allies (hand signals, comms discipline). Allies gain +1 to their next check if you describe the tactical situation to them from your hidden vantage.
Throat Cutter (Passive): Attacks against enemies who are unaware of you (hidden, behind them, distracted) automatically apply Bleed 2 on hit.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
Death Mark (Active, 1 AP): For the rest of the encounter, all attacks against a target get +1 accuracy and +1 damage per die. Once per encounter.
Ghost (Passive): While hidden, your first attack each turn automatically hits. Still roll for crit.

Phantom Strike (Passive): Once per turn, you can make a melee attack against any enemy within Medium range — you close the distance, strike, and return to your original position instantly. Costs normal AP for the attack.

Shadow Twin (Active, 3 AP): Create a shadow duplicate at your position. The duplicate lasts 2 rounds, has your Evasion, and enemies cannot distinguish it from you (50% chance any attack targets the duplicate instead). The duplicate cannot attack. Once per encounter.
